content: तर, तरण, तरणि, तरंड, तरि-री, तरीष &c. See under तॄ.

तरंडः, --डा, --डी, --डं [तॄ-अंडच्] A boat. --डः, --डं {@--1@} A raft or float made of bamboos tied together and floated on jars or inverted hollow gourds. {@--2@} The float of a fishing line. {@--3@} An oar.

तरंडः, --डा, --डी, --डं [तॄ-अंडच्] A boat. --डः, --डं {@--1@} A raft or float made of bamboos tied together and floated on jars or inverted hollow gourds. {@--2@} The float of a fishing line. {@--3@} An oar.
